## INSTALL Dependents
> npm install sekha-api

## ```EXAMPLE```
``` 
const skh = require('skh-api');
const title = 'surender'

skh.lyric(title)
    .then(result => {
     console.log(result)
});

const skh = require('skh-api');
const q = 'loli'

skh.pinterest(q)
    .then(result => {
     console.log(result)
});
```
